about_the_game:
The deckbuilding adventure begins!

Navigate treacherous lands and face formidable foes as you build and refine your deck.
Explore vast, ever-changing maps filled with mysteries and dangers.
Each decision shapes your destiny, making every playthrough a unique and thrilling experience.
No two journeys are alike, ensuring that the excitement never ends!

Unlock new cards and discover rare items to assist your future runs.
Adjust the difficulty to your skill level, learning the ropes in Adventure mode then chasing prized treasures in Quest mode.
(Try Nemesis mode, if you dare...)

Immerse yourself in a rich, free-to-play core campaign.
New realms can be explored with DLC expansion packs, each with its own unique characters, challenges and rewards.

Will you emerge victorious, or fall victim to the ever-shifting tides of fate?
Gather your cards, choose your path, and let battle commence!
